rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员挑战世卫组织甜味剂指南，呼吁紧急重新评估研究人员质疑世卫组织关于非糖甜味剂的指南，理由是其依赖于有偏见的前瞻性队列研究而不是随机对照试验。该研究呼吁紧急重新评估世卫组织的立场，因为最近的证据表明非糖甜味剂实际上可能会降低心脏代谢风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Researchers-challenge-WHOs-sweetener-guidelines-call-for-urgent-re-evaluation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Researchers-challenge-WHOs-sweetener-guidelines-call-for-urgent-re-evaluation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18833f21-2f8e-477c-be50-9ed3877c13f0 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:56:00 -0400 Researchers challenge WHO's sweetener guidelines, call for urgent re-evaluation
三氯蔗糖是对肠道健康更安全的甜味剂吗？研究发现，饮用含蔗糖的饮料会显着增加血液中细菌内毒素的水平，这是炎症和肠道屏障功能障碍的标志，而含三氯蔗糖的饮料则没有观察到这种影响。研究结果表明，就肠道健康和炎症而言，三氯蔗糖可能是蔗糖更安全的替代品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Is-sucralose-the-safer-sweetener-for-your-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Is-sucralose-the-safer-sweetener-for-your-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2370ca57-2814-4070-8405-a4ff57239b0f Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:37:00 -0400 Is sucralose the safer sweetener for your gut health?
一次绘制人体一个细胞：新研究揭示了细胞大小和计数之间的复杂关系发表在 PNAS 上的一项研究全面研究了人体细胞大小和计数之间的关系，该研究来自 1,500 多个来源，并识别了大约 400 种独特的细胞类型。该研究揭示了细胞大小和计数之间几乎成反比的关系，提供了一个定量框架，可以作为理解各种应用中细胞组成和功能的基线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Mapping-the- human-body-one-cell-at-a-time-New-study-reveals-the-intricate-relationship- Between-cell-尺寸和数量.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Mapping-the- human-body-one-cell-at-a-time-New-study-reveals-the-intricate-relationship- Between-cell-尺寸和数量.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d71bf0a-3042-4eb7-baac-a273c236cae0 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:17:00 -0400 Mapping the human body one cell at a time: New study reveals the intricate relationship between cell size and count
新的评估工具为诊断极端形式的社会孤立提供了实用指导一种新的评估工具为诊断一种被称为“蛰居”的极端社会孤立形式提供了实用指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/New-evaluation-tool-offers-practical-guidance-for-diagnosing-extreme-form-of-social-isolation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/New-evaluation-tool-offers-practical-guidance-for-diagnosing-extreme-form-of-social-isolation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2b1ec5a-f92b-492f-aec1-ac779e4cb825 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:15:29 -0400 New evaluation tool offers practical guidance for diagnosing extreme form of social isolation
酸奶可能有助于消除大蒜气味事实证明，酸奶可能有一个以前未知的好处：消除大蒜气味。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Yogurt-may-help-eliminate-garlic-odors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Yogurt-may-help-eliminate-garlic-odors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d033910-fb52-4bb3-8588-0638abf06fac Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:11:04 -0400 Yogurt may help eliminate garlic odors
年龄和基础疾病会增加住院 COVID-19 患者出现严重后果的风险根据美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) VISION Network 的一项涵盖 10 个州的研究，无论是否接种疫苗，至少有四种疾病风险因素都会使因 COVID-19 住院的成年人面临更高的严重后果风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Age-and-underlying-conditions-increase-risk-of-ritic-outcomes-for-hospitalized-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Age-and-underlying-conditions-increase-risk-of-ritic-outcomes-for-hospitalized-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2a935a2-81cb-4b66-9f6a-4446e302974f Tue, 19 Sep 2023 23:05:26 -0400 Age and underlying conditions increase risk of critical outcomes for hospitalized COVID-19 patients
研究揭示口腔健康与头颈癌患者生存之间的联系一项国际研究表明，被诊断患有头颈癌的人的口腔健康与生存之间存在密切关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-reveals-link- Between-oral-health-and-survival-among-head-and-neck-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Study-reveals-link- Between-oral-health-and-survival-among-head-and-neck-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fcc9d33-e8c1-4118-bd45-a7ab5b02e85a Tue, 19 Sep 2023 22:51:03 -0400 Study reveals link between oral health and survival among head and neck cancer patients
宾夕法尼亚大学护理学院获得赠款以支持加速护理计划宾夕法尼亚大学护理学院 (Penn Nursing) 获得贝德福德瀑布基金会 (Bedford Falls Foundation) – DAF 的 100 万美元资助，该基金会是由慈善家 William (Bill) E. Conway Jr. 联合创始人兼联合主席设立的捐助者建议基金凯雷集团的创始人和他的妻子乔安妮。这对夫妇捐赠了数百万美元来支持护理教育和奖学金，以解决国家护理劳动力短缺的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Penn-Nursing-receives-grant-to-support-accelerated-nursing-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Penn-Nursing-receives-grant-to-support-accelerated-nursing-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0dd8aa3-ac89-4189-bee4-893ca8431af5 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 22:45:40 -0400 Penn Nursing receives grant to support accelerated nursing program
植物性饮食可以降低患帕金森病的风险吗？ 《运动障碍》杂志最近的一项研究利用 126,283 名英国生物银行参与者的数据，研究了植物性饮食与帕金森病 (PD) 风险之间的关联。研究发现，健康植物性饮食指数 (hPDI) 处于最高四分之一的人患帕金森病的风险降低 22%，而不健康植物性饮食 (uPDI) 的风险则高出 38%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Can-a-plant-based-diet-lower-your-risk-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/Can-a-plant-based-diet-lower-your-risk-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c1da409-77ec-41d7-8d04-3768c2e59262 Tue, 19 Sep 2023 22:45:00 -0400 Can a plant-based diet lower your risk of Parkinson's disease?
UCR 研究人员获得 300 万美元资助，以防止太平洋岛民年轻人酗酒在之前的研究中，安德鲁·苏比卡（Andrew Subica）和他的同事发现，太平洋岛民年轻人中酒精使用障碍（或酒精滥用）和酒精相关危害的比例异常高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/UCR-researcher-receives-243-million-grant-to-prevent-alcohol-abuse-among-Pacific-Islander-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230919/UCR-researcher-receives-243-million-grant-to-prevent-alcohol-abuse-among-Pacific-Islander-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c85b3e4-e807-4007-afa1-1d530b1e7cfd Tue, 19 Sep 2023 22:37:31 -0400 UCR researcher receives $3 million grant to prevent alcohol abuse among Pacific Islander young adults
